title: Wish Skarsgård Had More to Do
review: 'I never got tired of looking at him, but I so wish that the movie had more scenes like the opening one, in which the devious Swedish actor Bill Skarsgård, from inside a sewer, gets to play Pennywise in his own rhythm. It's the most unsettling scene in the movie.' - Owen Gleiberman (Variety.com) Owen's statement hit the nail right on the head and it's exactly what I left the movie thinking.
